scripts.dev: npx prisma generate && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/cdk_prisma?schema=cdk_prisma' npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/cdk_prisma?schema=cdk_prisma' npx vite-node ./server.ts --watch -- --schema prisma/generated/prisma-appsync/schema.gql --handler cdk/lambda/prisma-appsync-handler.ts --watchers '[{"watch":["**/*.prisma","*.prisma"],"exec":"npx prisma generate && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/cdk_prisma?schema=cdk_prisma' npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && touch ./server.ts"}]'
scripts.deploy: cdk synth && cdk bootstrap && cdk deploy
